Data Fields
Mcspi_ChanParams Struct Reference
MCSPI Driver API

Structure to get the user param to enable the cross bar interrupt on M3 core. More...

#include <bsp_mcspi.h>

Data Fields

Ptr hEdma

UInt32 rxDmaEventNumber
 
UInt32 txDmaEventNumber
 

Detailed Description

Structure to get the user param to enable the cross bar interrupt on M3 core.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Mcspi_ChanParams::chanNum

To indicate which physical channel needs to be opened

Int32 Mcspi_ChanParams::chipSelTimeControl

Mcspi_ChipSelTimectrl Number of interface clock cycles introduced between CS toggling and first or last edge of SPI clock

Bool Mcspi_ChanParams::fifoEnable

To have the fifo or not in DMA mode. TRUE - FIFO is enabled FALSE - FIFO is disabled

Ptr Mcspi_ChanParams::hEdma

Edma handle

UInt32 Mcspi_ChanParams::rxDmaEventNumber

rx dma event number

Bool Mcspi_ChanParams::spiChipSelectHold

Sets the FORCE bit in the Conf register, if the slave requires to hold the SPIEN during its transaction the user can select this as a channel parameter TRUE - SPIEN will be held its active state FALSE - SPIEN will not be held its active state after each and every spi word transaction

UInt32 Mcspi_ChanParams::txDmaEventNumber

tx dma event number

Bool Mcspi_ChanParams::useAppSpecifiedDmaEvtNumbers

Use Dma event Numbers passed from application. TRUE to use the dma event numbers specified in rxDmaEventNumber and rxDmaEventNumber variables. FALSE to use the default dma event numbers defined inside driver.
